Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: â€¢ Hey there! So, people in Australia are clearly feeling the heat (and we don't mean from the rising temperatures!) - many Aussies are facing a sneaky $1500 tax hike, while others are sweating as they try to navigate the Reserve Bank of Australia's decision to raise (or not raise) interest rates. Meanwhile, companies are doing their best to sell their employees on free flu shots and we're all praying that the worst is over when it comes to this darn pandemic.
